content: How comes VS Code sometimes does and sometimes doesn't turn \< into ‚ü® ? Am I hitting some kind of combo -breaker key?
i've never seen that in my experience
Are you using the Vim extension by any chance?
Not that I knew of... is it auto-installed?

It isn't. If you aren't aware of it, then it is likely not installed.

I have no idea what could be causing the abbreviation mechanism to fail for you then.
